rows.label: qst710302_msg0001
rows.name:
How do? Have you got me some
machine parts?

rows.label: qst710302_msg0101
rows.name:
Excellent work! A fine haul you have
there! I extend my gracious thanks!

rows.label: qst710302_msg0102
rows.name:
At long last, I can now put the
finishing touches to my ultimate
creation! Hee hoo hoo!

rows.label: qst710302_msg0103
rows.name:
I call it Gennai's Special Patented
Perpetual Music Box!

rows.label: qst710302_msg0104
rows.name:
As the name suggests, with just one
turn of the key, it'll play music forever
and ever with no interruption!

rows.label: qst710302_msg0105
rows.name:
Hrm? What's that?
You want to know how to stop it?
Well...

rows.label: qst710302_msg0106
rows.name:
Gahahahaha! That's a good point!
I've not though of a good way yet!

rows.label: qst710302_msg0107
rows.name:
Eh, I think that's a problem for
Future Gennai to wrestle with.

rows.label: qst710302_msg0108
rows.name:
Anyway! You've helped me collect the
parts, so why don't I teach you how to
make your own as thanks?

rows.label: qst710302_msg0109
rows.name:
Ah!
Hold on now...it's coming to me...
Yes...YES...!!!

rows.label: qst710302_msg0110
rows.name:
EUREKA!
I've got it! A flash of inspiration for
a brand new invention!

rows.label: qst710302_msg0111
rows.name:
My next masterpiece that will address
any and all minor flaws which my last
masterpiece may or may not have had!

rows.label: qst710302_msg0112
rows.name:
And for that, I'm going to need lots
of parts that can withstand the dry
climate around the capital.

rows.label: qst710302_msg0113
rows.name:
I hear tell that you can find those
parts around Gula!

rows.label: qst710302_msg0114
rows.name:
I trust I can rely on your help finding
a few more of those parts?

rows.label: qst710302_msg0115
rows.name:
Excellent, excellent! Just bring them
back to me when you've found some.

rows.label: qst710302_msg0116
rows.name: Let us dare to dream hand in hand, eh?

rows.label: qst710302_msg0201
rows.name:
No, no, I'm afraid I'm still going to
need more parts lying around Iira
to finish off my invention.

rows.label: qst710302_msg0202
rows.name:
Especially those round cogamajigs.
So if you see any, bring me those first!
